skins.shipDescription: The name's Baltimore, Eagle Union heavy cruiser. Whoops, right, I'm not just a soldier anymore, but an idol as well. I agreed to do it, and I'm gonna do it as best I can. We'll be counting on your support, Commander.
skins.selfIntroduction: Heavy cruiser Baltimore, currently serving as an idol to test the Muse System. I'm giving it my all to put on the best performance you'll ever see.
skins.acquisition: The name's Baltimore, Eagle Union heavy cruiser. Whoops, right, I'm not just a soldier anymore, but an idol as well. I agreed to do it, and I'm gonna do it as best I can. We'll be counting on your support, Commander.
skins.login: What's on our schedule today, Commander? Same as always, I'm counting on you.
skins.details: A spin there... backstep there! Whew... Yeah, I'm just working out the choreography for our new single. Gotta come up with something everyone in the troop can dance, not just me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: There's tons of idol business to tend to, so I've not had much time to help people. Think you pick up the mantle for a while, Commander? Thanks, you're a hero! Hahahah!
skins.secretaryIdle2: These moves might be too hard for the Royal Navy girls... What do you think, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Th-this whole "cute" thing isn't exactly my thing... N-not that I hate it, and YOU seem to like it, I guess... Ughh...
skins.secretaryTouch: How's this for a signature pose? Good?
